channel.title: alter group on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in alter group on SiriDB documentation

item.title: set expression
item.description: Change the regular expression for a group. Examples # Create group `linux` create group `linux` for /linux.*/ # Change expression so we will match case insensitive alter group `linux` set expression /linux.*/i

item.title: set name
item.description: Change the name for a group. Note This statement expects a normal string using single or double quotes. The reason is that ‘set name’ expects a string and not a group. Example # Rename group `linux` to `ubuntu` alter group `linux` set name 'ubuntu'
